item.title: How to track your coworkers
item.description: How much information do you bleed? Ever wonder who is else is using your network? Or,who has actually showed up at the office? Networking primer The simplest thing we can do to make this work is to check to see which devices have registered themselves on the network. As devices come and go, they connect automatically, so we will have a pretty good idea if people are there or not.
